Pre-Game Insights: Australia’s selection chief George Bailey has confirmed that Steve Smith won’t be included in Australia’s playing 11 against New Zealand.
The Australian team is one of the favourites to lift the trophy in their home conditions.
The Australian team will play with 7 specialist batters, with all-rounders combining to act as the 5th bowler.
Marcus Stoinis is back after his side injury, and Mitch Marsh has started bowling in the nets.
Glenn Maxwell's form is a concern, but he has been backed by his teammates.
Mitchell Marsh is set to be the number three of the side, and Tim David has cemented his place in the lower middle order.
David Warner is looking fine and was not planned to play in the warm-up game against India regardless of his injury.
